BlackLicorice_Description: A chewy candy with an intense, pungent flavor.
CappuccinoMousseCake_Description: A small chocolate cake glazed with a cappuccino mousse.
ChocolatePopcorn_Description: It's normal popcorn... but with a chocolate coating.
CottonCandy_Description: A large pink cloud of spun sugar.
Fries_Description: Thin slices of potato, deep fried and then lightly salted.
IceCreamSandwich_Description: Vanilla ice cream sandwiched between two chocolate cookies.
JasmineTea_Description: Green tea flavored with aromatic jasmine flowers.
Jawbreaker_Description: It's a big, hard candy that lasts the whole movie!
JojaCola_Description: An extra-large cup of Joja's flagship soda.
JojaCorn_Description: Joja's patented corn food, slathered in plenty of "b'utter sauce".
KaleSmoothie_Description: It's loaded with vitamins and fiber.
Nachos_Description: Gooey, spicy cheese on top of freshly fried tortilla chips.
PanzanellaSalad_Description: A summer salad of bread and tomatoes.
PersonalPizza_Description: A pizza small enough to enjoy as a snack.
Popcorn_Description: Popped kernels of corn, dusted lightly with salt and drizzled with butter.
RockCandy_Description: Flavored sugar crystals attached to a convenient stick.
SalmonBurger_Description: A thick slab of salmon on a lightly toasted sesame seed bun.
SourSlimes_Description: Tiny gummy slimes of assorted colors. They're sprinkled with an extremely sour powder.
StarCookie_Description: A star-shaped shortbread cookie with rainbow sprinkles.
StardropSorbet_Description: A single drop of stardrop essence transforms this sorbet into an extraordinary treat.
TrufflePopcorn_Description: Heirloom popcorn sprinkled with truffle salt.
